name: Dyno Kids Adventure
description:
Dyno Kids Adventure

We will present the game Dino Puzzle Adventure .it is a wonderful adventure game in the jungle with a super little Dino as a strong Kid. It combines the classic game play and new skills from adventure games, with awesome levels that we have created for you! This game is easy to control, but also very addicting which will take you through different levels of running and jumping in this dangerous jungle. So you will join in exciting world adventures to reach home.
